channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12163] Move test annotation classes to the same package as in master
item.description:
Test classe annotations (SmallTests, etc) are in different packages in master vs 0.98 and branch-1 making backporting difficult.

Lets move them to the same package.
item.summary: Move test annotation classes to the same package as in master

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: IntelliJ missed a bunch of usage in tests. Let me try this again.

I noticed the test selector profiles aren't working for me – before or after this move patch. Someone with a beefy box can run the suite with and without the patches and verify the test counts are unchanged. Let me see if I have one that's reliable enough to verify.
Go for it on branch-1. Get it in quick before it rots.

I'd feel better about it with some test run confirmations but my hardware is flaking. Better to get it in and handle any fixup after?

Enis Soztutar, Andrew Purtell you gents okay with this approach?
I'm fine w/ fixup after it goes in when patch is this big and 'dumb'.
Rgr. Pushed to both branches. Attaching what was pushed. Will watch after jenkins.

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-0.98 #726 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-0.98/726/)
